item.title: Towering wall of dust rolls through metro Phoenix
item.description: A powerful storm has kicked up a towering wall of dust that rolled through metro Phoenix and darkened the sky

item.title: Melania Trump invites K-12 students to participate in nationwide AI challenge contest
item.description: Melania Trump is inviting students in grades K-12 to participate in a government-sponsored nationwide contest using artificial intelligence

item.title: The Coast Guard seized a record 76,000 pounds of drugs this summer
item.description: The U.S. Coast Guard says it seized a record 76,000 pounds of drugs this summer off Central and South America

item.title: Takeaways from scientists on the Trump administration's work on climate change and public health
item.description: Scientists are criticizing two key documents from the Trump administration that challenge the idea that climate change endangers the public

item.title: Wall Street steadies, global markets sink after Trump escalates feud with the Federal Reserve
item.description: Markets on Wall Street recovered some of their overnight losses after President Donald Trump announced he was firing Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Coo...
